title: Firefox crashed on Mac M1!!!
content:
Hi,

I don't know if this crash has only happened on other Macs or not but here's my report:

After updating Firefox to the latest update and I tried opening a Google Slide in presentation mode, the whole app crached!

I tried deleting FF and reinstalling it but the same issue happens again!
creator: ahsan99

title: How do I eliminate the Firefox "Bookmarks Side Bar"?
content: When I start Firefox or open a new tab, a "BOOKMARKS SIDEBAR" pops up on the Window on the left side. I do not want this SIDEBAR but can't find how to make it go away permanently.
creator: jagman55

title: Search engines not showing up on drop down
content: In the search engine option I accidentally deleted all search engines except duckduckgo. I want to add google or Bing but I cant get it in the drop down list
creator: rameshjey

title: You send me to pages in foreign languages
content:
You send me to pages in a foreign language. For example,I clicked LinkedIn, and it's in a foreign language.

When I click to go to a page often it's in a foreign language that I can't understand. I speak English. My only language setting is English.

Sometimes you send me that "Prove you're not a robot" that's all in characters like Chinese. I cannot understand it at all. I like Mozilla, but may have to use Google to get some work done.

Sometimes I use a VPN (Virtual Private Network) because I handle bills and finances online. Both myself and the IP address of the VPN are in the United States. I never do anything that involves foreign countries.
creator: harrysauerhoff
